Method Detail

calculateValue

protected double calculateValue(double u,
                                double v,
                                ChannelSignal source)
Determines the channel signal value based on the u,v inputs. Checks for a null source passed in and returns 0 if it is null.

Parameters:
u - u component used to determine the result.
v - v component used to determine the result.
source - Signal used to calculate the result
Returns:
the double value calculated from the source using the u,v inputs
